sections.text: sarvAnq. vA EṣO̱&gnau kAmAn pravEśayati|yO̱-&gnIna̍nvAdhAya̍# vratamupaiti|sa̍ yadaniṣṭvA̍ prayAyAt|akAmaprItA̍ EnaM kAmA nAnu prayAyuḥ|atEjA̍ avIrya̍ḥ̍ syAt|sa juhuyAt|tuByaM̍ tA a~ggirastama|viśvA̱ḥ̍ sukṣitayaḥ pRuthak|agnE̍ kAmAya̍ yEmira iti|kAmA̍nEvAsmi̍n̍ dadhAti|1 (10)

kAmaprItA̍ EnaM kAmA anuprayA̱nti|tEjasvI vIryAvAn̍ Bavati||santatirvA̍ EṣA yajñasya|yO̱-&gnIna̍nvAdhAya̍# vratamupaiti|sa̍ yadudvAyati|vicCi̍tti-rEvAsya̍ sA||taM prA~jcamuddhRutya̍|manasOpa̍tiṣṭhEta|manO̍ vai prajApatiḥ|prAjApatyO̍ yajñaḥ|2 (10)

manasaiva̍ yajñaṃ santanOti|BUrityA̍ha|BUtO̍ vai prajApatiḥ|BUti̍mEvOpai̍ti||vi̍ vA Eṣa indriyEṇa̍# vIryEṇarddhyatE|yasyA-hi̍tAgnE-ragnira̍pakṣAya̍ti|yAvacCamya̍yA̍ praviddhyE̱t|yadi tAvadapakṣAyE̱t|taṃ̍ saMBarEt|idaM̍ ta EkaM̍ para uta̍ Eka̱M|3 (10)

tRutIyEna̍ jyOtiṣA̍ sam~Mviśasva|sam~MvEśa̍nastanuvai̍ cArurEdhi|priyE̍ dEvAnA̱M paramE janitra iti|brahma̍ṇaivainaṃq̍ saMBarati|saiva̍ tataḥ prAyaścittiḥ|yadi̍# parasta-rAmapakṣAyE̱t|anu̍ prayAyAvasyEt|sO̍ Eva tataḥ prAyaścittiḥ||Oṣa̍dhIrvA̍ Etasya# paśUn payaḥ praviśati|yasya̍# haviṣE# vathsA apAkRutA̍ dhayanti|4̍ (10)

tAn. yadduhyAt|yAtayA̱mnA haviṣA# yajEta|yanna duhyAt|yajñaparu-rantariyAt|vAyavyA̱M̍ ~MyavAgUM nirvapEt|vAyurvai̍ payasaḥ̍ pradApayitA|sa EvAsmai payaḥ pradApayati|payO̍ vA Oṣadhayaḥ|payaḥ̍ payaḥ|paya̍saivAsmai̍ payO&varundhE|5̍ (10)

athOttarasmai̍ haviṣE# vathsAnapA kuryAt|saiva̍ tataḥ prAyaścittiḥ||anyatarAn.̍ vA Eṣa dEvAn BAgadhEyE̍na̍ vyarddhayati|yE̍ yajamAnasya̍ sAyaM gRuhamA-gacCanti|yasya̍# sAyaM dugdhaṃ havirArti-mArcCati̍|indrA̍ya̍ vrIhInni-rupyO-pavasEt|payO̍ vA Oṣadhayaḥ|paya̍# EvAraBya# gRuhItvO-pavasati|yatprAtaḥ̍ syAt|tacCRutaM kuryAt|6̍ (10)

athEtara̍ aindraḥ purOḍAśa̍ḥ̍ syAt|indriyE EvAsmai# samIcI# dadhAti|payO vA Oṣadhayaḥ|payaḥ̍ payaḥ|paya̍saivAsmai̍ payO&varundhE|athOtta̍rasmai̍ haviṣE# vathsAnapA kuryAt|saiva̍ tataḥ prAyaścittiḥ||uBayAnq.̍ vA Eṣa dEvAn BAgadhEyE̍na̍ vyarddhayati|yE̍ yajamAnasya̍ sAyaM ca# prAtaśca# gRuhamA-gacCanti|yasyOBayaṃ̍# havirArtti-mArcCati̍|7̍ (10)

aindraM pa~jcaśarAva-mOdanaM̍ nirvapEt|agniM̍ dEvatAnAM̍ prathamaM ~MyajEt|agnimu̍KA̍ Eva dEvatA̱ḥ prIṇAti|agniM ~MvA anvanyA dEvatA̱ḥ|indramanvanyAḥ|tA EvOBayI̱ḥ prIṇAti|payO vA Oṣadhayaḥ|payaḥ̍ payaḥ|paya̍saivAsmai̍ payO&varundhE|athOtta̍rasmai̍ haviṣE# vathsAnapA kuryAt|8̍ (10)

saiva tataḥ prAyaścittiḥ||arddhO̍ vA Etasya# yajñasya# mIyatE|yasya vratyE&han patnyanA-lamBukA̍ Bavati|tAma̍paruddhya̍# yajEta|sarvEṇaiva̍ yajñEna# yajatE|tAmiṣṭvO-pahvayEta|amUhama̍smi|sA̍ tvaM|dyaurahaM|pRuthivI tvaM ( )|sAmAhaM|RuktvaM|tAvEhi saMBavAva|saha̍ rEtO# dadhAvahai|puṃqsE putrAya vEttavai|rAyaspOṣA̍ya̍ suprajAstvAya# suvIryAyEti|arddha̍ EvainAmu-pahvayatE|saiva̍ tataḥ prAyaścittiḥ||9̍ (18) special kOrvai (sarvAnq. vi vai yadi# parastarAmOṣadhIran̍ yatarAnuBayAnardhO̍ vai ) 3.7.2 anuvAkaM 2 -agnihOtrasAmnAyyasAdhAraṇAni prAyaścittAni

yadviḥ ṣaṇṇEna̍ juhuyAt|aprajA̍ apaśuryajamAnaḥ̍ syAt|yadanAyatanE̍ ninayE̱t|anAyatana-ssyA̱t|prAjApatyayarcA valmIka-vapAyAma-va̍nayEt|prAjApatyO̍ vai valmIkaḥ|yajñaḥ̍ prajApatiḥ|prajApa̍tAvEva̍ yajñaM pratiṣṭhApayati|BUrityA̍ha|BUtO̍ vai prajApatiḥ|10̍ (10)

BUtimEvOpai̍ti|tat̍ kRutvA|anyAM dugdhvA punaṛ̍ hOtavya̱M|saiva tataḥ prAyaścittiḥ||yatkIṭA-va̍pannEna̍ juhuyAt|aprajA̍ apaśu-ryajamAnaḥ̍ syAt|yadanAyatanE̍ ninayE̱t|anAyatanaḥ syA̱t|maddhyamEna# parṇEna# dyAvA-pRuthivya-yarcA&nta̍ḥ̍ paridhi ninayEt|dyAvA̍pRuthivyO-rEvainat-prati̍ṣṭhApayati|11̍ (10)

tatkRutvA|anyAM dugdhvA punaṛ̍ hOtavya̱M|saiva tataḥ prAyaścittiḥ||yadava̍vRuṣṭEna̍ juhuyAt|aparUpa-masyAtma-~jjA̍yEta|kilAsO̍# vA syAdaṛśasO̍ vA̱|yat pratyEyAt|yajñaM ~MvicCindyAt|sa̍ juhuyAt|mitrO̍ janA̱n kalpayati prajAnann|12 (10)

mitrO dAdhAra̍ pRuthivImuta dyAM|mitraḥ kRuṣṭIra-nimiṣA̍ &BicaṣṭE|satyAya̍# havyaM GRutava-jjuhOtEti̍|mitrEṇaivaina̍t̍ kalpayati|tatkRutvA|anyAM dugdhvA punaṛhOtavya̱M|saiva̍ tataḥ prAyaścittiḥ||yat̍ pUrvasyA-mAhu̍tyAṃ̍ hutAyA-muttarA-&&hutiḥ̍ skandE̱t|dvipAdBiḥ̍ paśuBi-ryajamAnO̍ vyRu#ddhyEta|yadutta̍rayA̍ &BijuhuyAt|13̍ (10)

catuṣpAdBiḥ̍ paśuBi-ryajamAnO̍ vyRuddhyEta|yatra̍ vEttha# vanaspatE dEvAnAM guhyA nAmAni|tatra̍# havyAni# gAmayEti# vAnaspatya-yarcA samidha-mAdhAya̍|tUṣṇImEva̍ puna-rjuhuyAt|vanaspati̍naiva̍ yajñasyArtAM cAnA̱rtAM cAhutI̍ vidAdhAra|tatkRutvA|anyAM̍ dugdhvA punaṛ̍ hOtavya̱M|saiva tataḥ prAyaścittiḥ||yatpurA̍ prayAjEByaḥ̍ prA~ga~ggAraḥ̍ skandE̱t|addhvaryavE# ca yajamAnAya̍ cAkaṅ# syAt|14 (10)

yad dakṣiṇA|brahmaṇE̍# ca yajamAnAya̍ cAkaṅ# syAt|yat pratyak|hOtrE# ca patniyai̍ ca yajamAnAya̍ cAkaṅ# syAt|yaduda~g|agnIdhE̍# ca paśuByaśca̍ yajamAnAya̍ cAkaṅ# syAt|yadaBijuhuyAt|rudrO̱&sya̍ paśUn GAtukaḥ̍ syAt|yannABi# juhuyAt|aśA̱ntaḥ prahriyEta||15̍ (10)

sruvasya buddhnEnABi̍ nidaddhyAt|mA̍ tamO̍ mA yajñastamanmA̍ yajamAna-stamat|nama̍stE̍ astvAyatE|namO# rudra parAyatE|namO yatra# niṣIdasi|amuM̍ mA hiṃsIramuM̍ mA hiṃsIriti̍ yEna skandE̱t||taM praharEt|sahasra̍śRu~ggO̍ vRuṣaBO jAtavEdAḥ|stOma̍pRuṣṭhO̍ GRutavA̱n-thsupratIkaḥ|mA̍ nO# hAsInmEtthitO (hAsIrmEtthitO) nEttvA jahAma̍ ( )|gOpOṣaM nO# vIrapOṣaM ca# yacCEti|brahma̍ṇaivainaM̍ praharati|saiva̍ tataḥ prAyaścittiḥ||16̍ (13) special kOrvai (yadviḥṣaṇṇEna̍ prAjApatyayA yat kIṭA maddhyamEna̍ yadavavRuṣṭEna̍ yat pUrvasyAM̍ ~Myat purA prayAjEBya̍ pra~g~ggArO̍ yad dakṣiṇA̍ yat pratyagyaduda~g~g)̍ 3.7.3 anuvAkaM 3 -muKyAgnyasaMBavE&nukalpAḥ hOmAdhArAḥ

vi vA Eṣa indriyEṇa̍# vIryEṇarddhyatE|yasyA-hi̍tAgnE-ragni-rmathyamA̍nO̍ na jAyatE|yatrAnyaM̍ paśyE̱t|tata# AhRutya# hOtavya̱M|agnA-vEvAsyA̱-gnihOtraṃ hutaM Bavati||yadyanyaM̍ na vindEt|ajAyAṃ# hOtavya̱M|AgnEyI vA EṣA|yadajA|agnA-vEvAsyA̱-gnihOtraṃ hutaM Bavati|17̍ (10)

ajasya tu nAś~jIyAt|yadajasyA̱-ś~jIyAt|yAmEvAgnA-vAhu̍tiM̍ juhuyAt|tAmadyAt|tasmA̍dajasya̍ nAśya̱M||yadyajAM na vindEt|brAhmaṇasya dakṣiṇE̍ hastE# hOtavya̱M|Eṣa vA agni rvai̱śvAnaraḥ|yadbrA̱hmaṇaḥ|agnA-vEvAsyA̱-gnihOtraṃ hutaM Bavati|18̍ (10)

brAhmaṇaM tu vasatyai̍# nAparundhyAt|yadbrA̱hmaṇaM̍ ~MvasatyA̍ aparundhyAt|yasmi̍nnE-vAgnAvAhu̍tiM̍ juhuyAt|taM BAgadhEyE̍na̍ vyarddhayEt|tasmA̱d̍ brAhmaṇO vasatyai̍# nAparuddhyaḥ||yadi̍# brAhmaṇaM na vindEt|darBastabEM hOtavya̱M|agnivAn.̍ vai darBastabaMḥ|agnAvE-vAsyA̱-gnihOtraṃ̍ hutaM Bavati|darBAṅstu̍ nAddhyAsIta|19̍ (10)

yaddarBAnaddhyAsIta|yAmEvAgnA-vAhu̍tiM̍ juhuyAt|tAmaddhyAsIta|tasmA̱d̍ darBA nAddhyAsitavyA̱ḥ||yadi̍# darBAnna vindEt|aPsu hOtavya̱M|ApO̍ vai sarvA# dEvatA̱ḥ|dEvatA̱svE vAsyA̱-gnihOtraṃ hutaM Bavati|Apastu̍ na paricakṣIta|yadApa̍ḥ̍ paricakṣIta|20̍ (10)

yA mEvAPsvAhutiM̍ juhuyAt|tAM paricakṣIta|tasmAdApO̍ na paricakṣyA̱ḥ||mEddhyA̍# ca vA EtasyAmEddhyA̍ ca# tanuvau saṃsRujyEtE|yasyA-hi̍tAgnE-ranyairagniBi̍-ragnaya̍ḥ̍ saṃsRujyantE̱|agnayE vivicayE̍ purOḍAśa-maṣṭAka̍pAlaM̍ nirvapEt|mEddhyA̱M̍ caivAsyA-mEddhyAM̍ ca# tanuvau vyAvartayati||agnayE̱̍ vratapatayE̍ purOḍAśa-maṣṭAka̍pAlaM̍ nirvapEt|agnimEva̍ vratapatiṅq̍ svEna# BAgadhEyE-nOpadhAvati|sa̍ EvainaM̍ ~MvratamA-laBaMyati||21̍ (10)

garBaṅq sravantamagadama̍kaḥ|agni-rindra-stvaṣṭA̍ bRuhaspatiḥ|pRuthivyA-mava̍cuścO-taitat|nABi-prApnO̍ti̍ niṛRutiM̍ parAcaiḥ||rEtO vA EtadvAjina-mAhi̍tAgnEḥ|yada̍gnihOtraM|tadyathsravE̱t|rEtO̱&sya̍ vAjinaṅ̍ sravEt|garBaṅq sravantama-gadama̍ka-rityA̍ha|rEta̍# EvAsmin vAjinaM̍ dadhAti

agnirityAha|agnirvai̍ rEtOdhAḥ|rEta̍# Eva taddadhAti|indra̍ ityAha|indriya-mEvAsmi̍n-dadhAti|tvaṣṭEtyA̍ha|tvaṣṭA̍ vai paśUnAM̍ mithunAnAṃ̍# rUpakRut|rUpamava paśuṣu# dadhAti|bRuhaspatirityAha|brahma̍ vai dEvAnAM bRuhaspatiḥ̍ ( )|brahmaṇaivAsmai̱̍ prajAḥ prajanayati||pRuthivyA-mava̍cuścOtaita-dityA̍ha|asyA-mEvainat̍ pratiṣṭhApayati||nABi̍ prApnOti̍ niṛRutiM̍ parAcairityAha|rakṣa̍sAmapa̍hatyai||23̍ (15) (ajA&gnAvEvAsyA̱gnihOtraṃ hutaM Bavati̍ - Bava - tyAsIta - paricakṣIta̍ - lamBayati - dadhAti - dEvAnAM bRuhaspatiḥ pa~jca# ca) (A3) special kOrvai (vi vai yad yanyamajAyA̱M brAhmaṇasya# darBastambE̱&Psu hOtavya̱m)̍ 3.7.4 anuvAkaM 4 -aiṣṭikayAjamAnamantrAḥ

yAḥ purastA̱t prasravanti|upari̍ṣṭAth̍ sarvataśca̍ yAḥ|tABI# raśmipavitrABiḥ|śraddhAM̍ ~MyajñamAraBE||dEvA̍# gAtuvidaḥ|gAtuM ~MyajñAya# vindata|manasaspati̍nA̍ dEvEna|vAtA̱d-yajñaḥ̍ prayujyatAM||tRutIya̍syai̍ divaḥ|gAyatriyA sOma ABRutaḥ|24̍ (10)

sOmapIthAya saMnayituM|vaka̍la-manta̍ramAda̍dE||ApO̍# dEvIḥ śuddhAḥ stha|imA̍ pAtrAṇi̍ śundhata|upAta~gkyAya̍ dEvAnA̱M|parṇavalkamuta śundhata||payO̍# gRuhEṣu payO# aGniyAsu|payO̍# vathsEṣu paya indrAya̍ haviṣE̱ dhriyasva|gAyatrI parṇavalkEna̍|payaḥ̍ sOmaM̍ karOtvimaM

agniM gRuhṇAmi̍ surathaM ~MyO mayO̍ BUḥ|ya udyantamA̍ rOhati̍ sUryamahnE̱|AdityaM jyOtiṣAM̍ jyOtiruttamaM|śvO̍ yajñAya# ramatAM dEvatA̱Byaḥ||vasU̱n rudrAnAdityAn|indrE̍ṇa̍ saha dEvatA̱ḥ|tAḥ pUrvaḥ parigRuhṇAmi|sva̍ AyatanE̍ manIṣayA̱||imAmUrjaM̍ pa~jcadaśIM ~MyE praviṣṭAḥ|tAndEvAn̍ parigRuhṇAmi̍ pUrvaḥ|26̍ (10)

agniṛ havyavAḍiha̍ tAnAvahatu|paurṇamAsaṃ̍ haviridamEṣAM̍ mayi|AmAvAsyaṃ̍# haviridamEṣAM̍ mayi||antarA&gnI̍ paśavaḥ|dEvasaṃq̍ sadamAgamann|tAn̍ pUrvaḥ parigRuhṇAmi|sva̍ AyatanE̍ manIṣayA̱||iha prajA viśvarUpA̍ ramantAM|agniM gRuhapatimaBi̍ sam~MvasAnAḥ|tAḥ̍ pUrvaḥ parigRuhṇAmi|27̍ (10)

sva AyatanE̍ manIṣayA̱||iha paśavO# viśvarUpA̍ ramantAM|agniM gRuhapatimaBi̍ sam~MvasAnAḥ|tAn̍ pUrvaḥ parigRuhṇAmi|sva̍ AyatanE̍ manIṣayA̱||ayaM pitRuṇAmagniḥ|avA̱ḍḍhavyA̍ pitRuBya A|taM pUrvaḥ parigRuhṇAmi|avi̍ṣaM̍ naḥ pituM karat||aja̍sraM̍ tvAṃ saBApAlAḥ|28̍ (10)

vijayaBAgaṃq̍ samindhatAM|agnE̍# dIdAya# mE saBya|vijityai̍ śaradaḥ̍ śataM||annamAvasathIya̱M|aBiha̍rAṇi̍ śaradaḥ̍ śataM|AvasathE śriyaM mantra̱M|ahirbuddhniyO̍ niyacCatu||idamaha-magni̍ jyE̱ṣṭhEByaḥ|vasuByO̍ yajñaM prabravImi|idamaha-mindra̍# jyEṣṭhEByaḥ|29 (10)

rudrEByO# yajñaM prabravImi|idamahaM̍ ~Mvaruṇa-jyEṣṭhEByaḥ|AdityEByO̍# yajñaM prabravImi||paya̍svatI-rOṣa̍dhayaḥ|paya̍svadvIrudhAM̍ payaḥ|apAM̍ payasO̍ yatpayaḥ|tEna̍ mAmindra̍ saṃsRuja||agnE̱̍ vratapatE vrataM cariṣyAmi|tacCa̍kEyaM̍ tanmE# rAddhyatAM|vAyO̱ vratapata Aditya̍ vratapatE|30 (10)

vratAnA̱M ~MvratapatE vrataM cariṣyAmi|tacCa̍kEyaM̍ tanmE# rAddhyatAM||imAM prAcImudIcIM|iṣamUrja̍maBi̍ saṅskRutAM|bahuparṇAmaśu̍ṣkAgrAM|harA̍mi̍ paśupAmahaM||yatkRuṣṇO# rUpaM kRutvA|prAviśastvaM̍ ~MvanaspatIn|tatastvAmE̍kaviṃśatidhA|saMBa̍rAmi̍ susaMBRutA̱

trIn paridhIṅstisraḥ̍ samidhaḥ|yajñAyu̍ranusaMcarAn|upavEṣaM̍ mEkṣaṇaM̍ dhRuṣṭi̱M|saMBarAmi̍ susaBRuMtA̱||yA jAtA Oṣadhayaḥ|dEvEBya̍# striyugaM purA|tAsAM parva# rAddhyAsaM|paristara-mAharann||apAM̍ mEddhyaM̍ ~Myajñiya̱M|sadEvaṃ̍ śivamastu̍ mE|32 (10)

AcCEttA vO mA riṣaM|jIvA̍ni̍ śaradaḥ̍ śataM||aparimitAnAM̍ parimitAḥ|saMna̍hyE̍ sukRutAyakaM|EnO mA nigA̱M katamacca nAhaM|punarutthAya̍# bahulA Bavantu||sakRudAcCinnaM̍ barqḥirUrṇAmRudu|syOnaM̍ pitRuByastvA̍ BarAmyahaM|asmin thsIdantu̍ mE pitaraḥ̍ sOmyAḥ|pitAmahAḥ prapitAmahAścAnugaiḥ̍ saha

trivRut palAśE̍ darBaḥ|iyA̱n prAdEśa samiMtaḥ|yajñE̍ pavitraM pOtRutamaM|payO̍# havyaM karOtu̍ mE||imau prAṇApAnau|yajñasyA~ggA̍ni̍ sarvaśaḥ|ApyAyayantau̍ saMcaratAM|pavitrE̍# havyaśOdhanE||pavitrE̱̍ sthO vaiṣṇavI|vAyurvAM manasA̍ punAtu

ayaM prAṇaścApAnaśca̍|yaja̍mAna-mapi̍gacCatAM|yajñE̍ hyaBUtAM̍ pOtArau|pavitrE̍# havyaśOdhanE||tvayA̍ vEdiM̍ ~Mvividuḥ pRuthivIM|tvayA# yajñO jAyatE̍ viśvadAniḥ|acCi̍draM̍ ~MyajñamanvEṣi̍ vidvAn|tvayA hOtA santanOtyarddhamAsAn||trayastriṃqśO̍&si̍ tantUnAM|pavitrE̍ṇa̍ sahAgahi|35̍ (10)

śivEyaṃ rajjuraBidhAnI̱|aGniyA-mupa̍sEvatAM||apra̍sraṃsAya̍ yajñasya|uKE̍ upadadhAmyahaM|paśuBiḥ̍ saMnItaM̍ biBRutAM|indrAya̍ śRutaM dadhi||upavEṣO̍&si̍ yajñAya|tvAM̍ parivEṣa-ma̍dhArayann|indrA̍ya̍ haviḥ kRuṇvantaḥ|śivaḥ̍ śagmO BavAsi̍ naḥ

amRunmayaM̍ dEvapAtraM|yajñasyAyuṣi̍ prayujyatAM|tiraḥ̍ pavitramatinItAḥ|ApO̍# dhAraya mA&tiguḥ||dEvEna̍# savitrOtpUtAḥ|vasOḥ̍ sUryasya̍ raśmiBiḥ|gAM̍ dOhapavitrE̍ rajju̱M|sarvA pAtrAṇi̍ śundhata||EtA Acaranti̍ madhumadduhA̍nAḥ|prajAva̍tI-ryaśasO̍# viśvarUpAḥ|37̍ (10)

bahvI rBavantIrupa̍ jAyamAnAḥ|iha̍ va indrO# ramayatu gAvaḥ||pUṣA stha||ayakṣmA̍ vaḥ̍ prajayA saṃsRujAmi|rAyaspOṣE̍ṇa̍ bahulA BavantIḥ|UrjaM̍ payaḥ pinvamAnA̍ GRutaM ca|jIvO̍ jIvantIrupa̍# vaḥ sadEyaM||dyauścEmaM ~MyajñaM pRuthivI̍ ca saMduhAtAM|dhAtA̍ sOmEna̍ saha vAtEna̍ vAyuḥ|yajamAnAya̍ draviṇaM̍ dadhAtu

BUrBuvaḥ svaḥ|OjO̍ bala̱M|brahma# kṣatraM|yaśO# mahat|satyaM tapO nAma|rUpa-mamRuta̱M|cakṣuḥ̍ śrOtra̱M|mana Ayuḥ|viśvaM̍ ~MyaśO# mahaḥ|samaM tapO harO BAḥ ( )|jAtavEdA̍ yadi# vA pAvakO&si|vaiśvAnarO̍ yadi# vA vaidyutO&si|śaM̍ prajAByO yajamAnAya̍ lOkaM|UrjaM puṣṭiM dada-daByAva̍vRuthsva||10̍ (14) 3.10.6 anuvAkaM 6 -anuvAkEṣu navasu lEKAsu nAByAM cEṣṭakOpadhAnaM svayamAtRuṇṇOpadhAnaM cOcyatE

rAjñI# virAjñI̱|samrAjñI̱ svarAjñI̱|arciḥ śOciḥ|tapO harO BAḥ|agni-rindrO bRuhaspatiḥ|viśvE̍# dEvA Buvanasya̍ gOpAḥ|tE mA sarvE yaśasA̍ saṃsRujantu||11̍ (7) (rAjñIndrO# mA sapta (A6) 3.10.7 anuvAkaM 7 -anuvAkEṣu navasu lEKAsu nAByAM cEṣṭakOpadhAnaM svayamAtRuṇṇOpadhAnaM cOcyatE

asavE̍ svAhA vasavE̍ svAhA̱|viBuvE̍ svAhA vivasvatE̍ svAhA̱|aBiBuvE svAhA-&dhipatayE̍ svAhA̱|divAMpatayE̍ svAhA &ṃhaspatyAya̍ svAhA̱|cAkṣuṣmatyAya svAhA̱ jyOtiṣmatyAya svAhA̱|rAjñE svAhA# virAjñE svAhA̱|samrAjñE svAhA̱ svarAjñE svAhA̱|śUṣAya̍ svAhA sUryAya̍ svAhA̱|candramasE̍ svAhA jyOtiṣE̍ svAhA̱|saṃqsarpAya̍ svAhA# kalyAṇAya̍ svAhA̱ ( )|arjunAya̍ svAhA̱||12 (11) 3.10.8 anuvAkaM 8 -anuvAkEṣu navasu lEKAsu nAByAM cEṣṭakOpadhAnaM svayamAtRuṇṇOpadhAnaM cOcyatE

vipaścitE pavamAnAya̍ gAyata|mahI na dhArA &tyandhO# aṛṣati|ahiṛha̍ jIrṇAmatisarpati̍ tvaca̱M|atyO na krIḍanna̍ saradvRuṣA hariḥ|upayAmagRu̍hItO&si̍ mRutyavE̱ tvA juṣṭaM̍ gRuhṇAmi|Eṣa tE yOnirmRutyavE̱̍ tvA||apa# mRutyu-mapakṣudha̱M|apEtaḥ śapathaM̍ jahi|adhA# nO agna Avaha|rAyaspOṣaṃ̍# sahasriṇa̱M|13 (10)

yE tE# sahasramayutaM̍ pAśA̱ḥ|mRutyO martyAya̍ hantavE|tAn.̍ yajñasya# mAyayA̱|sarvAnava# yajAmahE||BakṣO̱ &syamRuta Bakṣaḥ|tasya# tE mRutyu-pItasyA-mRuta̍vataḥ|svagA-kRu̍tasya̍ madhumataḥ|upa̍hUtasyO-pa̍hUtO̍ BakṣayAmi||mandrA &BiBUtiḥ̍ kEtu ryajñAnAM ~MvAk|asAvEhi|14̍ (10)
andhO jAgRuviḥ̍ prAṇa|asAvEhi|badhira̍ A̱krandayita-rapAna|asAvEhi|ahastOstvA̍ cakṣuḥ|asAvEhi̍|apAdAśO̍ manaḥ|asAvEhi̍|kavE̍ vipracittE̍ śrOtra|asAvEhi̍|15̍ (10)
suhastaḥ suvAsAḥ|śUṣO̍ nAmA̱sya-mRutO martyEṣu|tantvA&haM̍ tathA vEda|asAvEhi̍|agnirmE̍# vAci śritaḥ|vAgGRudayE|hRuda̍yaM̍ mayi|ahamamRutE̱|amRutaM̍ brahmaṇi|vAyurmE̱̍ prAṇE śritaḥ|16 (10)
prAṇO hRudayE|hRuda̍yaM̍ mayi|ahamamRutE̱|amRutaM̍ brahmaṇi|sUryO̍# mE cakṣuṣi̍ śritaḥ|cakṣurq. hRudayE|hRuda̍yaM̍ mayi|ahamamRutE̱|amRutaM̍ brahmaṇi|candramA̍# mE manasi̍ śritaḥ|17 (10)
manO hRudayE|hRuda̍yaM̍ mayi|ahamamRutE̱|amRutaM̍ brahmaṇi|diśO̍# mE śrOtrE̱ śritAḥ|śrOtraṃq hRudayE|hRuda̍yaM̍ mayi|ahamamRutE̱|amRutaM̍ brahmaṇi|ApO̍# mE rEtasi̍ śritAḥ|18 (10)
rEtO hRudayE|hRuda̍yaM̍ mayi|ahamamRutE̱|amRutaM̍ brahmaṇi|pRuthivI̍ mE śarIrE̍ śritA|śarIraṃq̍ hRudayE|hRuda̍yaM̍ mayi|ahamamRutE̱|amRutaM̍ brahmaṇi|OṣadhivanaspatayO̍# mE lOmasu̍ śritAḥ|19 (10)
lOmAni̍ hRudayE|hRuda̍yaM̍ mayi|ahamamRutE̱|amRutaM̍ brahmaṇi|indrO̍# mE balE̱ śritaḥ|balaṃq hRudayE|hRuda̍yaM̍ mayi|ahamamRutE̱|amRutaM̍ brahmaṇi|parjanyO̍# mE mUrddhni śritaḥ|20 (10)
mUdrdhA hRudayE|hRuda̍yaM̍ mayi|ahamamRutE̱|amRutaM̍ brahmaṇi|IśA̍nO̍ mE manyau śritaḥ|manyuṛ hRudayE|hRuda̍yaM̍ mayi|ahamamRutE̱|amRutaM̍ brahmaṇi|AtmA̍ ma# Atmani# śritaḥ( )|21 (10)

AtmA hRudayE|hRuda̍yaM̍ mayi|ahamamRutE̱|amRutaM̍ brahmaṇi|puna̍rma̍ AtmA punarAyurAgA̱t|punaḥ̍ prAṇaḥ punarAkUta-mAgA̱t|vaiśvAnarO̍ raśmiBi# rvAvRudhAnaḥ|antastiṣṭhatvamRuta̍sya̍ gOpAḥ||22 (8) special kOrvai (agnir vAyuḥ sUrya# ścandramA diśa Apaḥ̍ pRuthi vyOṣadhivanaspataya̍ indraḥ̍ parjanya IśAna̍ AtmA punarmE̍ trayOdaśa)̍ 3.10.9 anuvAkaM 9 -anuvAkEṣu navasu lEKAsu nAByAM cEṣṭakOpadhAnaM svayamAtRuṇṇOpadhAnaM cOcyatE

prajApati̍ rdEvAnasRujata|tE̍ pApmanA saMditA̍ ajAyanta|tAn vyadyat|yad̍ vyadyat|tasmA̱d vidyut|tamavRuścat|yadavRu̍ścat|tasmAd̍ vRuṣṭiḥ|tasmAd̍ yatraitE dEvatE# aBiprApnutaḥ|vica̍# haivAsya tatra# pApmAnandyataḥ|23̍ (10)

vRuścataśca||saiṣA̍ mImAṃqsA&gni̍hOtra̍ Eva sapaMnnA|athO̍# Ahuḥ|sarvEṣu̍ yajñakratuṣviti||hOṣya̍nnapa̍ upaspRuśEt|vidyu̍dasi̍ vidyamE̍ pApmAnamiti|atha̍# hutvOpaspRuśEt|vRuṣṭi̍rasi̍ vRuśca# mE pApmAnamiti|yakṣyamA̍ṇO̍ vEṣṭvA vA̱|vi ca# haivAsyaitE dEvatE# pApmAnaM dyataḥ|24̍ (10)

vRuścataśca||atyaṃqhO̍ hAruṇiḥ|brahmacAriṇE̱̍ praśnAn prOcya prajiGAya|parE̍hi|plakṣaM̍ daiyA̱M (daiyyA̱M) pAtiM pRucCa|vEttha# sAvitrAM(3) na vEtthA(3) iti|tamAgatya̍# papracCa|AcAryO# mA prAhaiṣIt|vEttha̍# sAvitrAM(3) na vEtthA(3) iti|sahO̍vAca̍ vEdEti||25̍ (10)

sa kasmin pratiṣṭhita̍ iti|parOra̍jasIti̍|kastadyat̍ parOrajA̍ iti|Eṣa̍ vAva sa parOrajA̍ iti# hOvAca|ya Eṣa tapati|EṣO̱̍ &rvAgrajA̍ iti|sa̍ kasmin̍ tvEṣa iti|satya̍ iti|kiM̍ tathsatyamiti|tapa̍ iti|26̍ (10)

kasminnu tapa iti|bala̍ iti|kiM̍ tad balamiti|prAṇa̍ iti|mAsma̍# prAṇamati# pRucCa iti# mA&&cAryO̱ &bravIditi# hOvAca brahmacArI||sahOvAca̍ plakṣO daiyA̱M (daiyyA̱M) pAtiḥ|yadvai brahmacArin̍ prAṇamatyaprakṣyaḥ|mUdrdhA̍ tE vyapatiṣyat|ahamu̍ta̍ AcAryA-cCrEyA̱n BaviṣyAmi|yO mA# sAvitrE samavAdiṣṭEti̍|27̍ (10)

tasmA̱th sAvitrE na sam~MvadEta||sa̍ yO havai sAvitraM̍ ~MviduṣA# sAvitrE sam~MvadatE|sahA̱smi-~jCriya̍M̍ dadhAti|anu# havA asmA̍ asau tapa~jCriyaM̍ manyatE|anvasmai̍ śrIstapO# manyatE|anvasmai̍ tapO balaM̍ manyatE|anvasmai̍ balaM̍ prAṇaM manyatE||sa̍ yadAha|sajñAMna̍M̍ ~MvijñAnaM daṛśA# dRuṣṭEti|Eṣa̍ Eva tat

atha yadAha|prastu̍taM̍ ~Mviṣṭutaṃ̍ sutA sunvatIti̍|Eṣa̍ Eva tat||Eṣa hyEva̍ tAnyahAni|Eṣa̍ rAtrayaḥ||atha̍ yadAha|citraḥ̍ kEtu rdAtA pradAtA̍ savitA̍ prasavitA̍ &BiśAstA̍ &numantEti̍|Eṣa̍ Eva tat|Eṣa hyEva̍ tE&hnO# muhUrtAḥ|Eṣa rAtrE̱ḥ

atha yadAha|pavitra̍M̍ pavayiṣyan-thsahasvAn-thsahI̍yAnaruṇO̍# &ruṇarajA̍ iti|Eṣa̍ Eva tat|Eṣa hyEva̍ tE̱ &drdhamAsAḥ|Eṣa mAsA̱ḥ||atha yadAha|agniṣṭOma̍ ukthyO̱&gniṛ Rutuḥ prajApatiḥ̍ sam~Mvathsara iti|Eṣa̍ Eva tat|Eṣa hyEva̍ tE yajñakratava̍ḥ|Eṣa̍ Rutavaḥ|30̍ (10)

Eṣa sam~Mvathsaraḥ||atha̍ yadAha|idAnI̱M̍ tadAnImiti|Eṣa̍ Eva tat|Eṣa hyEva̍ tE muhUrtAnA̱M̍ muhUrtAḥ||janakO ha vai dEhaḥ|ahOrAtraiḥ̍ samAjagAma|taṃ̍ hOcuḥ|yO̍ vA asmAn. vEda|vijaha̍t-pApmAna̍mEti|31̍ (10)

sarva-mAyurEti|aBi̍ svargaM ~MlOkaM jayati|nAsyA-muṣmi̍n̍ ~MlOkE&nnaM̍ kṣIyata iti||vijaha̍ddha̍ vai pApmAnamEti|sarvamAyu̍rEti|aBi̍ svargaM ~MlOkaM jayati|nAsyA-muṣmi̍n̍ ~MlOkE &nnaM̍ kṣIyatE|ya EvaM ~MvEda||ahI̍nA̍ hAśvatthyaḥ|sAvitraM̍ ~MvidAM cakAra|32̍ (10)

sa ha# haṃqsO hiraṇmayO̍# BUtvA|svargaM ~MlOkamiyAya|Adityasya̍ sAyujyaM||haṃqsO̍ havai hiraṇmayO̍# BUtvA|svargaM ~MlOkamEti|Adityasya̍ sAyujyaM|ya̍ EvaM ~MvEda||dEvaBAgO̍ ha# śrautarq.ṣaḥ|sAvitraM ~MvidAM cakAra|taṃ̍ ha vAgadRuśyamAnA̍ &ByuvAca|33̍ (10)

sarvambata̍ gautamO vEda|yaḥ̍ sAvitraM̍ ~MvEdEti|sa̍ hOvAca|kaiṣA̍ vAgasIti|ayamahaṃ̍ sAvitraḥ|dEvAnA̍-muttamO̍ lOkaḥ|guhyaM mahO biBraditi|EtAva̍ti̍ ha gautamaḥ|yajñOpavItaM kRutvA-&dhO nipapAta|namO̍ nama iti|34̍ (10)

sa hOvAca|mA̍ BaiṣI̍ rgautama|jitO vai tE# lOka iti||tasmAdyE̍ kE ca# sAvitraM ~Mviduḥ|sarvE tE jitalOkAḥ||sa̍ yO havai sAvitra-syAṣṭAkṣa̍raM̍ padaṅ śriyA &BiṣiktaM̍ ~MvEda|śriyA̍ haivABiṣicyatE|GRuṇiriti̍ dvE akṣarE̱|sUrya iti trIṇi|Aditya̍ iti trIṇi|35̍ (10)

Etadvai sAvitra-syAṣṭAkṣa̍raM̍ padaṅ śriyABiṣiktaM|ya̍ EvaM ~MvEda|śriyA̍ haivABiṣicyatE||tadE-tadRucA-&Byu̍ktaM|RucO̍ akṣarE# paramE vyOmann|yasmi̍n̍ dEvA adhi viśvE# niṣEduḥ|yastanna vEda kimRucA kariṣyati|ya̍ it tadvidusta imE samAsata̍ iti||na̍ havA EtasyarcA na yajuṣA̍ na sAmnA-&rthO̱&sti|yaḥ sAvitraM̍ ~MvEda||36̍ (10)

tadEtat pari̍ yaddEvacakraM|ArdraM̍ pinvamAnaṅ̍ svargE lOka Eti|vijahad̍ viśvA# BUtAni# sapaMśyat||ArdrO̍ ha vai pinvamAnaḥ̍ svargE lOka Eti|vijahan̍ viśvA# BUtAni# sapaMśyann|ya̍ EvaM ~MvEda||śUṣO̍ havai vA̱rṣṇEyaḥ|AdityEna# samAjagAma|taṃ̍ hOvAca|Ehi̍# sAvitraM ~Mviddhi̍ ( )|ayaM ~Mvai svargyO̱&gniḥ pArayiṣṇu-ramRutA-thsaMBU̍ta̍ iti|Eṣa̍ vAva sa sAvitraḥ|ya̍ Eṣa tapati|Ehi̍ mAM ~Mviddhi|iti̍# haivainaM taduvAca||37̍ (15) special kOrvai (prajApatirdEvAn̍ sajñAMnaM prastutaM̍ tAnyahA̱nyEṣa rAtrayAscitra̍ kEtustE&hnO# muhUrtO rAtrE̱ḥ pavitraM tE̱&rdha mAsA agniṣṭOmO̍ yajñakratava̍# idAnI̱M muhUrtAnA̱M janakO&hInA̍ dEvaBAgaḥ kaiṣA vA~gma śUṣO ha vai ṣOḍaśa)̍ 3.10.10 anuvAkaM 10 -anuvAkEṣu navasu lEKAsu nAByAM cEṣṭakOpadhAnaM svayamAtRuṇṇOpadhAnaM cOcyatE

iyaM ~MvAva saraGA̱|tasyA# agnirEva sAraGaM̍ madhu|yA̍ EtAḥ pU̱rvapakṣA-parapakṣayO rAtrayaḥ|tA̍ madhukRuta̍ḥ|yAnyahA̍ni|tE̍ madhuvRuṣAḥ|sa̍ yO ha vA EtA madhukRuta̍śca̍ madhuvRuṣAṅśca vEda|kurvanti̍# hAsyaitA agnau madhu|nAsyE̱ṣṭApUrtaM̍ dhayanti||atha̍ yO na vEda|38̍ (10)

na hA̱syaitA agnau madhu# kurvanti|dhayantyasyEṣṭApUrtaM||yO̍ ha vA ahOrAtrAṇA̱-nnAmadhEyA̍ni̍ vEda|nAhO̍rAtrEṣvA-rtimArcCa̍ti|sajñAMna̍M̍ ~MvijñAnaM daṛśA# dRuṣṭEti|EtA-va̍nuvAkau̍ pU̱rvapakṣasyA-hOrAtrAṇA̱M̍ nAmadhEyAni|prastu̍taM̍ ~Mviṣṭutaṃ̍ sutA sunvatIti̍|EtAva̍nu-vAkAva̍-parapakṣasyA̍-hOrAtrAṇA̱M̍ nAmadhEyAni|nAhO̍rAtrEṣvA-rtimArcCa̍ti|ya̍ EvaM ~MvEda||39̍ (10)

yO ha vai muhUrtAnA̱M̍ nAmadhEyAni̍ vEda|na̍ muhUrtEṣvA-rtimArcCa̍ti|citraḥ̍ kEtu rdAtA pradAtA̍ savitA̍ prasavitA̍ &BiśAstA̍ &numantEti̍|EtE̍&nuvAkA̍ muhUrtAnA̱M̍ nAmadhEyAni|na̍ muhUrtEṣvA-rtimArcCa̍ti|ya̍ EvaM ~MvEda||yO̍ ha vA adrdhamAsA-nA̱~jca̍ mAsAnA~jca̍ nAmadhEyAni̍ vEda|nAdrdha̍mAsEṣu̍ na mAsEṣvA-rtimArcCati|pavitra̍M̍ pavayiṣyan-thsahasvAn-thsahI̍yAnaruṇO̍# &ruṇarajA̍ iti|EtE̍&nuvAkA̍ adrdhamAsAnA̱~jca̍ mAsAnA~jca̍ nAmadhEyAni|40̍ (10)

nAdrdhamasEṣu̍ na mAsEṣvA-rtimArcCati|ya̍ EvaM ~MvEda||yO̍ ha vai yajñakratUnAM̍ cartUnAM̍ ca# sam~Mvathsarasya# ca nAmadhEyAni̍ vEda|na̍ yajñakratuṣu̍ nartuṣu na sam~Mvathsara̍ ArtimArcCati|agniṣṭOma̍ ukthyO̱&gniṛ Rutuḥ prajApatiḥ̍ sam~Mvathsara iti|EtE̍# &nuvAkA yajñakratUnAM̍ cartUnAM̍ ca# sam~Mvathsarasya# ca nAmadhEyAni|na̍ yajñakratuṣu̍ nartuṣu na sam~Mvathsara̍ ArtimArcCati|ya̍ EvaM ~MvEda||yO̍ ha vai muhUrtAnA̱M̍ muhUrtAn. vEda|na̍ muhUrtAnA̱M̍ muhUrtEṣvArti mArcCati̍ ( )|41 (10)

idAnI̱M tadAnImiti|EtE̍ vai muhUrtAnA̱M̍ muhUrtAḥ|na muhUrtAnA̱M̍ muhUrtEṣvArti-mArcCati|ya̍ EvaM ~MvEda||athO̍ yathA̱ kṣEtrajñO BUtvA &nu# praviśyAnna-matti|EvamEvaitAn̍ kṣE̱trajñO BUtvA &nu# praviśyA-nnamatti|sa̍ EtEṣAmEva̍ salOkatAṃq̍ sAyujya-maśnutE|apa̍# punarmRutyuM jayati|ya̍ EvaM ~MvEda||42̍ (9) special kOrvai (iyamahOrAtrAṇAṃ̍# sajñAMnaM̍ pUrvapakṣasya prastutamaparapakṣasya̍# muhUrtAnA̱M citraḥ kEturadrdhamAsAnA̱M̍ pavitraM̍ ~MyajñakratUnAmagniṣṭOmO̍ yajñakratUnAmidAnI̱M̍ muhUrtAnA̱M muhUrtAn. vEdEdAnImathO dvAdaśa)̍ 3.10.11 anuvAkaM 11 -anuvAkEṣu navasu lEKAsu nAByAM cEṣṭakOpadhAnaM svayamAtRuṇṇOpadhAnaM cOcyatE

kaściddhavA̍ asmA-llOkAt prEtya|AtmAna̍M̍ ~MvEda|aya-maha-masmIti|kaścithsvaM̍ ~MlOkaM na prati prajAnAti||agnimu̍gdhO̍ haiva dhumatA̱ntaḥ|svaM ~MlOkaM na prati prajAnAti|atha̍ yO haivaita-magniṃ sAvitraM̍ ~MvEda|sa̍ EvAsmA llOkAt prEtya|AtmAna̍M̍ ~MvEda|aya-maha-masmIti|43̍ (10)

sa svaM ~MlOkaM prati prajAnAti||Eṣa̍ u# vEvainaM tathsAvitraḥ|svargaM̍ ~MlOka-maBivahati||ahOrAtrai̍ rvA idaṃ sayugBiḥ̍ kriyatE|iti rAtrAyA# dIkṣiṣata|iti rAtrAya# vrata-mupAguriti̍|tAni̍ hAnEvaM̍ ~Mviduṣaḥ|amuṣmi̍n̍ ~MlOkE śEvadhiM̍ dhayanti|dhItaṃ̍ haiva sa śEvadhi-manuparai̍ti||atha̍ yO haivaitamagniṃ sAvitraM̍ ~MvEda|44̍ (10)

tasya# haivA-hOrAtrAṇi̍|amuṣmi̍n̍ ~MlOkE śEvadhiM̍ na dhayanti|adhI̍taṃ̍ haiva sa śEvadhi-manuparai̍ti||BaradvA̍jO̍ ha triBirAyurBi̍ rbrahmacaryamuvAsa|taṃ̍ ha jIrṇiṅq sthaviraṃq̍ śayAnaM|indra̍# upavrajyO# vAca|BaradvAja|yattE̍# caturthamAyurdadyAM|kimE̍nEna̍ kuryA iti|brahmacarya̍mEvainE̍na̍ carEyamiti# hOvAca|45 (10)

uśan. ha vai vAjaśravasaḥ̍ sarvavEdasaM̍ dadau|tasya̍# ha nacikEtA̍ nAma# putra Asa|taṃ̍ ha# kumAraṃ santa̱M|dakṣiṇAsu̍ nIyamAnAsu̍ śraddhA &&vivEśa|sa̍ hOvAca|tata̍ kasmai mAM dA̱syasIti|dvitIya̍M̍ tRutIya̱M||taṃ ha parIta̍ uvAca|mRutyavE̱ tvA dadAmIti||taṃ̍ ha smOtthitaM̍ ~MvAgaBivadati|42̍ (10)

gautama̍ kumAramiti|sa̍ hOvAca|parE̍hi̍ mRutyO rgRuhAn|mRutyavE vai tvA&dA-miti̍||taM̍ ~Mvai pravasantaM̍ gantAsIti# hOvAca|tasya# sma tisrO rAtrI-ranA̱śvAn gRuhE vasatAt|sa̍ yadi# tvA pRucCEt|kumAra̍ kati rAtrI-ravAthsI-riti̍|tisra̍ iti prati# brUtAt|kiM prathamAṃ̍ rAtri-mAśnA̍ iti|43̍ (10)
